Happy Earth Day! We invite you to take the #EarthDay survey. The completion of this 5 min survey will provide #AACOG with feedback about recycling and solid waste services in our community. Your input will assist in understanding the recycling and solid waste services our community needs, in preparation for short and long term planning. #EarthDay2020 Thank you for your participation!!

Parents/Guardians Dilley ISD is currently working on plans for Graduation ceremonies. These are for both the Seniors and the Kindergarten students. We are having to develop these plans within the guidelines existing at this time and working these out take time. We hope to have plans for release within the next couple of weeks. Dilley ISD appreciates your ongoing support as we will all get through this together.
#Dilleypride

Parents / Guardians,
Due to safety concerns in relation to the train and the City of Dilley the parade route will be condensed to the west side of town or west of the train tracks. As per the City of Dilley, spectators can line the parade route but they must stay in their car, truck, or bed of the truck and all occupants must wear a facial mask. Those spectators who are in violation will be asked to leave by the City of Dilley PD. Please come out and show your support for the class of 2020 in a safe and healthy manner. Thank you.
